import React from 'react'; import "./navBar.css"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils'; const NavBar = ({ currentUser }) => (
  • Gurus
  • Courses
  • Learning
  • { currentUser ?
    auth.signin()}> Signin
    : Sign out }
); export default NavBar;
